title: I have a request for all of you
body:
Just like driving, you risk assessment and reaction speed is super important (like your judgement and decision making).

Things that affect you ability to drive well in any of these areas will also affect your ability to play league in the same way.

Think about that every time you consider playing tired, drunk, high or stressed and distracted... think about the outcome for other 4 people you will be playing with.

There are other things you could be doing at that time lol
